trans-unit.source: Provides a synchronization context for the Windows Forms application model.
trans-unit.target: Ger en synkroniseringskontext för modellen för Windows Forms-program.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"></xref> is installed when a control is created.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger ett värde som anger om den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"> </xref> installeras när en kontroll har skapats.

trans-unit.source: The AutoInstall property determines whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext> is installed when a control is created, or when a message loop is started.
trans-unit.target: Automatisk installation-egenskapen bestämmer om den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>installeras när en kontroll har skapats, eller när en meddelandeloop startas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"></xref> is installed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"> </xref> är installerad, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies the synchronization context.
trans-unit.target: Kopierar kontexten synkronisering.

trans-unit.source: A copy of the synchronization context.
trans-unit.target: En kopia av synkroniseringskontext.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Frigör alla resurser som används av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>.
trans-unit.target: Anropa Dispose när du är klar med hjälp av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Dispose lämnar den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>oanvändbar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: När du anropar Dispose, måste du släppa alla referenser till den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>så skräpinsamlingen kan frigöra minne som den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>var upptar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [Rensa ohanterade resurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) och [implementera en metod för ta bort](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alltid anropet avyttra innan du släpper senaste referens till <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: De resurser som den använder frigörs annars inte förrän skräpinsamlingen anrop av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>objektets `Finalize` metod.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>

trans-unit.source: Dispatches an asynchronous message to a synchronization context.
trans-unit.target: Skickar ett asynkront meddelande till en synkroniseringskontext.

trans-unit.source: The Post method starts an asynchronous request to post a message.
trans-unit.target: Post-metoden startar en asynkron begäran att skicka ett meddelande.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback> delegate to call.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback>ombud att anropa.</xref:System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback>

trans-unit.source: The object passed to the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som skickats till ombudet.

trans-unit.source: Dispatches a synchronous message to a synchronization context
trans-unit.target: Skickar meddelandet synkront till en synkroniseringskontext

trans-unit.source: If the destination thread no longer exists or the value of its <xref:System.Threading.Thread.IsAlive%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `false`, the Send method raises an <xref:System.ComponentModel.InvalidAsynchronousStateException>.
trans-unit.target: Om måltråden finns inte längre eller värdet för dess <xref:System.Threading.Thread.IsAlive%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen är `false`, Send-metoden genererar <xref:System.ComponentModel.InvalidAsynchronousStateException>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.InvalidAsynchronousStateException> </xref:System.Threading.Thread.IsAlive%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: It is up to the caller to determine what further action to take.
trans-unit.target: Det är anroparen att avgöra vilka åtgärder att vidta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback> delegate to call.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback>ombud att anropa.</xref:System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback>

trans-unit.source: The object passed to the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som skickats till ombudet.

trans-unit.source: The destination thread no longer exists.
trans-unit.target: Måltråden finns inte längre.

trans-unit.source: Uninstalls the currently installed <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"></xref> and replaces it with the previously installed context.
trans-unit.target: Avinstallerar den nuvarande installerade <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"> </xref> och ersätter den med den tidigare installerade kontexten.

trans-unit.source: If the previously installed <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext> is `null`, the current context is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Om den tidigare installerade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>är `null`, den aktuella kontexten har angetts till `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>

trans-unit.source: If the currently installed synchronization context is not a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>, this method does nothing.
trans-unit.target: Om den installerade synkroniseringskontext inte är en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>, den här metoden gör ingenting.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>
